briefTitle: Total Hip Replacement Study Of GSK576428 (Fondaparinux Sodium)
officialTitle: Clinical Evaluation of GSK576428 (Fondaparinux Sodium) in Prevention of Venous Thromboembolism After Elective Total Hip Replacement Surgery
summary: This study is requested by PMDA to confirm the optimal dose for THR (total hip replacement).

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Venous Thromboembolism (VTE) During Efficacy Period
